['No longer reduces  Eye of the Storm strike interval from 0.7/0.6/0.5 to 0.6/0.5/0.4.', 'Now causes  Eye of the Storm to strike two enemies at once, instead of just one.', " Aghanim's Scepter\nNo longer reduces  Eye of the Storm strike interval from 0.7/0.6/0.5 to 0.6/0.5/0.4.\nNow causes  Eye of the Storm to strike two enemies at once, instead of just one."]

['Reduced minimum damage from 80/120/160/200 to 60/100/140/180.', 'Increased maximum damage from 140/210/280/350 to 160/230/300/370.', ' Plasma Field
Reduced minimum damage from 80/120/160/200 to 60/100/140/180.
Increased maximum damage from 140/210/280/350 to 160/230/300/370.', ' Static Link
No longer breaks if Razor loses vision of the target.
Can no longer be targeted on the ground (doing so launched the link in a line, which attached itself to an enemy hero if it found one within range).
